document.heading: Legal Service Establishment Amendment Act of 1998

history.narrative: Law 12-260, the “Legal Service Establishment Amendment Act of 1998,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 12-660, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 1, 1998, and December 15, 1998, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 31, 1998, it was assigned Act No. 12-612 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 12-260 became effective on April 20, 1999.
